text: Danny Strack is a performance poet and juggler, residing in Austin, TX.https://berkeleypoetryslam.wordpress.com/2014/02/19/get-to-know-our- spotlight-feature-danny-strack/ He currently runs the Austin Poetry Slam,http://kut.org/post/austin-poetry-slammers-compete-make-national-team a weekly show at the Spider House Ballroomhttp://impactnews.com/austin- metro/central-austin/austin-poetry-slam/ on Tuesday nights. He has been a regular performer at the Austin Poetry Slam, as well as other Central Texas venues including The Hideout Theatre, Kickbutt Coffee, Expressions, Ruta Maya and Neo Soul since 2003.http://texasgrandslam2014.tumblr.com/post/63079506730/competitor-profile- danny-strack He is a four-time member of the Austin Poetry Slam Team: 2007, 2008, 2009 and 2010, and a multiple time coach. In 2008, the team advanced to Finals and placed 3rd overall at the National Poetry Slam in Madison, WI. He was next on the Austin Neo Soul Nationals team,http://austin.culturemap.com/news/arts/07-30-12-10-29-witness-austins- two-best-slam-poetry-teams-before-they-head-off-to-slam-nationals/ which placed first in the Group Poem Finals at the 2012 National Poetry Slam in Charlotte, NC.http://austin.culturemap.com/news/arts/08-14-12-11-07-central- texas-slam-poets-bring-home-multiple-national-poetry-slam-championships/ Danny has also been a feature poet on EXSE,http://www.myspace.com/exsespokenword a showcase of Austin's best poets for Channel Austin and the Austin International Poetry Festival.http://www.aipf.org/ In 2013, Danny collaborated with Texas State Musician, Craig Hella Johnson, of Austin's Conspirare to produce "Fusion",http://austin.culturemap.com/news/arts/04-25-13-choir-meet- slam-poetry-slam-poetry-meet-choir/ a workshop show that attempted to fuse spoken word poetry with choral song.http://www.newmusicbox.org/articles/different-spaces-erewhon-and-fusion/ ==Publications== * Growth ==Career highlights== * 2012 National Poetry Slam Group Champion (w/ Austin Neo-Soul). * 2010 Austin Poetry Slam Champion.http://alibi.com/blog/s/arts/xy_1966/Get-your-rhyme-on.html * Member of the Austin Poetry Slam team: 2007, 2008,http://www.austin360.com/blogs/content/shared- gen/blogs/austin/outandabout/entries/2008/04/11/fat_and_sassy_t.html 2009, 2010 * 2007: Southwest Shootout Individual Champion in Albuquerque, New Mexico * 2008: 3rd Place Overall Team at the 2008 National Poetry Slam * 2010: Frontera Festhttp://www.fronterafest.org/site/index.html Best of Week Wild Card for "Growth"http://www.austinchronicle.com/gyrobase/Issue/story?oid=oid%3A935781 * 2005, 2006, 2008, 2010: Frontera Fest Best of Fest for "Haiku Death Match" ==External links== * Official Website * Austin Poetry Slam * Frontera Fest ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American male poets Category:American spoken word poets Category:Slam poets Category:21st-century American poets
title: Danny Strack
